message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to start with an offer of $180 for the product. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $180 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $140 for it. Can you meet me at this price?
I understand you're interested in the product, Bob, but $140 is still a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer it to you for $160. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $160 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $145 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?
I'm not willing to go as low as $145, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to make sure I get a fair price for the product. I'll offer it to you for $155. What do you think?
I appreciate your concession, but $155 is still a bit higher than I'm willing to pay. I'm willing to pay $150 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?
